20110124140531.000|20110124140534.000|CC1|IS CROSSING THE LINE AND IT     
20110124140534.000|20110124140536.000|CC1|VIOLATES CHILD PORNOGRAPHY

20110124140609.000|20110124140610.000|CC1|PROFANITY AND GLORIFIED DRUG    
20110124140610.000|20110124140611.000|CC1|USE.

20110124140612.000|20110124140614.000|CC1|ABOUT THE REAL ISSUES TEENAGERS 
20110124140614.000|20110124140618.000|CC1|ARE DEALING WITH, WHICH INCLUDE 
20110124140618.000|20110124140618.000|CC1|SEX AND DRUGS.
